Articles.Content:
Hello! I just wanted to ask if anybody here knows when will HangarExtender for 1.4.2/3 be released.

Thanks, LusBax.

Moving to Add-on Discussions, since this isn't a "my KSP isn't working" sort of problem.

Though it's worth noting that if you have a question about a particular mod, the best place to ask is usually in the mod's own thread, since that's where the expert users (and author!) hang out.
